text: Rereao Tetaake Eria is a former I-Kiribati politician. Succeeding to her husband Mr Tetaake Eria, she served as a member of parliament for Teraina in the ninth and tenth Parliaments of Kiribati. She represented the Pillars of Truth (Boutokan Te Koaua) party. In the 2015–16 Kiribati parliamentary election, she lost her seat to Uriam Iabeta. ==References== Category:Living people Category:21st-century I-Kiribati women politicians Category:Members of the House of Assembly of Kiribati Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Pillars of Truth politicians Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:People from the Line Islands (Kiribati) Category:21st-century I-Kiribati politicians
title: Rereao Tetaake Eria
